amendment.description: Amendment requires the Solar Technology Roadmap Committee to submit an annual report to the Secretary of Energy and the Congress on its activities over the prior 12-month period.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 11 printed in House Report 111-304 to require the Solar Technology Roadmap Committee to submit an annual report to the Secretary of Energy and the Congress on its activities over the prior 12-month period.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Murphy (NY) amendment (A011) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A011) offered by Mr. Murphy (NY).
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Murphy (NY) amendment (A011) Agreed to by voice vote.
